TM2 Dinobot, there's proof. Megatron used schematics and DNA from the origi=
nal Dinobot to build a new one, therefor making the original version of the=
 Beast Wars semi-orgainc.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Jon Hogan=
 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, October 05, 2000 8:20 AM
  Su=
bject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  (OOC:)

  True they may have lungs....but doe=
s that mean they're organic? 
  Consider medical technology. When our lungs=
 fail can we not get 
  artifical lungs built or be put on a machine that m=
imics the effect 
  of "breathing". So yes maybe they need to breathe but s=
till there's 
  no proof either for or against, to be honest, that the beas=
t forms 
  use organic bits.

  Anyways in the long run I don't think it re=
ally matters eh? :)



  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
  =
> OOC: Not necesarily, jhogan.  Remeber when Cheetor said "Cant 
  breathe"=
 when 
  > he was in beast mode?
  > 
  > :::Ratchet:::
  > 
  > ::He walks=
 inside to help Rhinox fix the ark::
  > Ratchet: How c'n i help?  Ya cant =
fix this hunk of junk alone!
